QuestData.Title: A Blackthorn Blend
QuestData.Description: Ah, just the mushroomancer I wanted to see! Mind getting me some clay?$b$bThere's all kinds of different soil, you know. It's not all just dirt! And clay... clay is something special. You ever try growing through clay? Oh, I guess not.$b$bIt's hard work to break down, but once you do the flavor is incomparable! My roots are looking forward to the challenge.$b$BBlackthorn Grove has a particularly bitter and complex clay that is just what I'm craving. I'm sure they won't mind if you ask them for some.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Blackthorn Clay in Blackthorn Grove.
QuestData.RewardText: Ooh, that's the stuff all right. It's bitter, sure, but wonderfully complex and subtle undertones. Mm! You'll have to try some sometime.
